text.text: All three file-boxes to be selected
If you want to back to default, click 'Remove files'
To hide all clouds, click button 'Hide all clouds'
To show all clouds, click button 'Show all clouds'
text.issue: KNOWN BUG: if you set frame numbers using selector, you may need to click 'Hide all clouds' and only then 'Show all cloud'

text.text: Select 'Hide' or 'Show' and numbers of frames, then click 'Set' - only selected frames for each clouds will be displayed
Click play to play all frames. Previous frames are darken than current for each cloud
Pause means that you have freeze current frame
Stop means that viewer goes back the first frame
Set checkbox 'Hide previous frames' to display only current frame
'Play only...' opens block where you can set frames to play
Write frames to play, click 'Set' and then 'Play'
